text: Ezɨ Hiram, Solomonɨn akar kam baregha, an navim bar dera, ezɨ a kamaghɨn mɨgei, “E datɨrɨghɨn Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn ziam fam. Guizbangɨra, an otarir aghuim isa Devit ganɨngizɨma, an an danganim inigha, atrivimɨn otogha kantrin gavgavir kamɨn gari. Devitɨn otarir kam, a bar nɨghnɨzir aghuiba ko fofoziba iti.”
